mapper.select: SELECT i.inbound_id, i.warehouse_id, w.name AS warehouse_name, i.member_id, m.member_name, i.staff_id, st.staff_name, pt.partner_name, i.inbound_status, ii.inbound_item_id, ii.product_id, p.product_name, c.category_cd, c.category_name, ii.quantity, i.inbound_requested_at, i.inbound_at, i.inbound_reject_reason FROM inbound i LEFT JOIN warehouse w ON i.warehouse_id = w.warehouse_id JOIN member m ON i.member_id = m.member_id JOIN partner pt ON m.partner_id = pt.partner_id LEFT JOIN inbound_item ii ON i.inbound_id = ii.inbound_id LEFT JOIN product p ON ii.product_id = p.product_id LEFT JOIN category c ON p.category_cd = c.category_cd LEFT JOIN staff st ON i.staff_id = st.staff_id WHERE i.inbound_id = #{inboundId}
